Posts.Content: hlth4513 wrote: I have had mild lymphedema since my MX last July. Actually, my arm had been swollen for a couple of years before my BC DX - but I never knew until my MX that 6 of my nodes on that side were "scarred" and not working.  I have a custom compression sleeve that I wear when exercising, but other than that, I have just been really careful. Yesterday I pulled a muscle in my arm (the one where 9 nodes were removed). It a long story - but involves a 75lb Golden Retriever puppy. It is very sore and I am freaking that this will make my LE much worse. I have been wearing my compression sleeve and I have been icing it - but can I wear the sleeve 24/7? ANy suggestions would be appreciated. Thanks! Beth Dx 7/2/2009, IDC, 1cm, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/9 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pulled Muscle and Lymphedema hlth4513 Binney4

Posts.Content: Apr 27, 2010 02:47PM hlth4513 wrote: Binney- Thanks so much - I will follow your advice. I will also tell "Enzo" he can't chase after "birds of prey" any more - even when they sweep down right in front of him to grab a GEcko - while "Mommy" is holding the leash. Beth
